article_title: House Dem mistakes satire blog for news source
article_text:
(Washington Examiner) There was an awkward moment at today’s House Oversight and Government Reform Committee hearing on Obamacare when a New York Democrat rapped GOP critics with quotes from a satirical New Yorker feature, The Borowitz Report.

Rep. Carolyn Maloney, while calling it her own “distinguished comedic think tank,” quoted from several stories in the Borowitz satire blog as if they were accurate …

article_metadata.description: A Free Press For A Free People Since 1997
